mapper.select: select i.content_id, i.title, i.addr1, i.readcount, i.content_type_id, i.first_image, d.overview from attraction_info i, attraction_description d where content_type_id = 12 and i.content_id = d.content_id order by readcount desc limit 1,3;
select content_id, title, addr1, content_type_id, first_image, readcount from attraction_info where content_type_id = 39 order by readcount desc limit 5;
select * from attraction_info where title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') and sido_code = ${sido_code} and content_type_id = ${content_id};
